The PFAS Action Act will require the EPA to regulate these chemicals by limiting human exposure, stop further contamination into the environment and continue to identify health risks associated with PFAS.

Today the House passed H.R. 535, the PFAS Action Act – PFAS are man-made chemicals that have been linked with serious health effects such as cancer, impaired child development, infertility and thyroid disease.
